title: Odyssey - Greatest Hits @320
description:
Odyssey was mostly a trio consisting of Tony Reynolds and sisters Lillian and Louise Lopez; Bill McEachern, at some point, replaced one of the Lopez sisters.
"Native New Yorker," a monster record, has no relatives here; its composers, Sandy Linzer and Denny Randell, never created another song for Odyssey as good. A few ballads are exquisite, and some up-tempo numbers, especially Lamont Dozier&#039;s "Going Back to My Roots," are dancefloor gems.

There is something for everybody here with its timeless dance tracks like New York city girl, Use it up, Back to my roots to big power ballads such as "looking for a way out".



01. Going Back To My Roots                                                                                              
02. Inside Out                                                                                                          
03. Magic Touch                                                                                                         
04. Oh No Not My Baby                                                                                                   
05. Weekend Lover                                                                                                       
06. Don&#039;t Tell Me, Tell Her                                                                                             
07. Native New Yorker                                                                                                   
08. Use It Up And Wear It Out                                                                                           
09. Hang Together                                                                                                       
10. It Will Be Alright                                                                                                  
11. Follow Me (Play Follow The Leader)                                                                                  
12. Easy Come, Easy Go                                                                                                  
13. When You Love Somebody                                                                                              
14. If You Are Lookin&#039; For A Way Out                                                                                    
15. Native New Yorker (Brooklyn Club Mix)        


1,2,7,8,9,14 are full-length album tracks


Label: RCA/BMG
Date: 1989

BITRATE: 320
